name: Puzzel Nite
summary:
Free to play fast-paced skill based Puzzle Game. Play against other players of the same level in a real-time competitive format. Customize your character and become the master in PUZZELNITE. If you love old school Puyo Puyo, Puzzle Fighter and Tetris attack, this is a game you have to try. Easy to learn and a life time to master. Don’t pay to win, pay to look cool, pay to show off, and pay for more content. 
 
Battle in 2 game modes and more to come with subsequent updates 
- Play against other players in a competitive rank matching system that matches you against players of the same skill level. Try to out play your opponent and reach Masters level. Rank matches resets every season. Play every season to maintain your rank. 
- Play in an offline score attack mode. Out score other people on the leader board or use it as practice to play against the AI in a survival type of game style. 
-Game modes are constantly evolving with many more additions to come 
 
Character customization 
- Customize your character to show your own unique gem fighting style. 
- Character customization are continuously evolving with many more outfits, weapons and hair styles to come. 
 
Constantly evolving 
- Look out for new game modes and more character customizing features. 
 
DLC or Micro-transactions 
- Purchase entire updates without overspending on extra content or purchase what you need from the store. Your game your style. 
 
Please Note! PuzzelNite is free to download and play, however, some items and entire updates can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings. Also under our Privacy Policy you must be at least 9 years of age to play or download PuzzelNite. 
 
Features 
- Skill base gameplay 
- Competitive Real-time ranked matches against similar skilled players 
- Offline score attack mode with full leader board 
- In-game fighter customization 
- Rank up to Masters level and show the entire world your true skills 
- Don’t pay to win. Pay to look cool, show off and for more content.
